pageContext.claim: “One of their political weapons is ‘Cancel Culture’ -- driving people from their jobs, shaming dissenters, and demanding total submission from anyone who disagrees. This is the very definition of totalitarianism, and it is completely alien to our culture and our values, and it has absolutely no place in the United States of America.”
pageContext.analysis: This is beyond Trump's usual hyperbole. Protests and boycotts have been around for centuries. Totalitarianism is a system of government that subjects citizens to complete state authority.
